synopsis.text: Once upon a time in the corporate world, Saki Watase, a dedicated office worker, finds herself in a financial bind. In an attempt to earn some extra cash, she signs up for a part-time product review job. To her surprise, the first product she receives is a massive box of XL condoms. Overwhelmed, she sets the task aside. One evening, after a work gathering that leaves her inebriated, her enigmatic and somewhat intimidating boss, Keisuke Sudou, offers to escort her home. Upon discovering the box of condoms, Keisuke offers to assist Saki with the testing, revealing an unexpected side to his character. As they navigate this unusual situation, a romantic triangle unfolds with the introduction of another XL figure, Riku. Will Saki find love amidst the chaos of product reviews and office politics? Join us on this unconventional journey filled with laughter, love, and XL surprises!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
